String.string: Let the game begin.
The Bloody Statue activates.
The Radiant Statue activates.
The Cursed Statue activates.
The Bloody Statue and Radiant Statue activate.
The Bloody Statue and Cursed Statue activate.
The Radiant Statue and Cursed Statue activate.
The Bloody Statue appears again.
The Radiant Statue appears again.
The Cursed Statue appears again.
The boss emits a foul odor.
Someone has been chained.
The area collapses!
Destroy the pylons to summon a Lancer or a Priest (not required for a 5-person party).
Defeat Nightmare Nedra with a summoned Lancer.
The outer area is filled with <font color='#BFFF00'>green</font> fumes.
The outer area is filled with <font color='#8977AD'>purple</font> fumes.
Defeat Nightmare Ptakum with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat Nightmare Kylos with a summoned Lancer.
You can find Divine Pylons on both sides of the entrance. Destroy the pylons from within 10m when needed.
Defeat Nightmare Nedra with a summoned Priest.
Defeat Nightmare Ptakum with a summoned Priest.
Defeat Nightmare Kylos with a summoned Priest.
The combat area is closed.
Use the basic buff items and additional buff items before combat.
Buff items can be purchased from the <font color = '#FFFF00'>Training Dungeon Merchant</font>.
The dungeon is now closed. Type '/reset' or use the 'Reset Instances' button in your Profile (P).
Intruders! Get them!
I'll use Infuriate! Attack now!
MORE AGGRO!
I'll hold this thing off! Give it your best shot!
I've activated Adrenaline Rush and Guardian Shout! Attack!
Attack this sphere before it explodes!
